events.message: Customer reported a collision involving their car and another vehicle at an intersection downtown.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and keywords.
A claims agent specialized in auto accidents was assigned to handle the customer's case.
The customer was contacted to acknowledge receipt of the auto accident claim and next steps.
Customer was asked for police reports, photos of the damaged vehicle, and witness statements.
All requested documents including photos and the police report were submitted by the customer.
The investigation team began examining the evidence related to the auto accident claim.
Investigation concluded with confirmation that the customer's vehicle sustained moderate damage.
A settlement offer was proposed to cover the repair costs of the damaged vehicle after the accident.
The customer responded positively to the settlement proposal and expressed satisfaction with the process.
The claim was officially approved based on the investigation findings and customer agreement.
Payment for the approved settlement was processed and issued to the customerâ€™s account.
The auto accident claim was successfully closed after payment issuance and final confirmation.
